critique: The executive order seems to be a routine administrative action, so it is unlikely to evoke strong emotions. The order simply transfers a small piece of land from the Chugach National Forest to private ownership. Therefore, the scores for all emotions should be very low. The initial scores are all set to 1, indicating a minimal level of each emotion. After further consideration, I still believe that the emotional impact of this executive order is minimal, so I will keep the scores at 1.
